column2: Ingredients : sugar, cocoa, dark chocolate, egg, butter, vanilla sugar. In a bow, melt the chocolate in a bain marie or in the microwave. Add the butter, cut into small pieces. Stir well until the butter is melted. Add the egg yolks,...
